about_the_game:
Pudding rules supreme! The second official Character Song Pack for 100% Orange Juice contains the QP character song "Pudding Pop" in 3 different versions!

Tracks are included in both .mp3 and .WAV versions.

Vocals: QP (Sato Azusa) and Marie Poppo (Maruyama Miki)
Cover Art: Kagawa Yusaku
